casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Jose Cotto (8730)

O’Connell, Foti and Lavery, Js.

Argued January 8 decision released January 22, 1991 *802Brian M. O’Connell, with whom was Philip L. Pettijohn, law student intern, for the appellant (defendant). Margaret G. Radionovas, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Paul Murray, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
